Then one day [PAWN_pronoun] returned to the smouldering ruins of [PAWN_possessive[ home. [PAWN_nameDef] became obsessed with seeking out forbidden knowledge, knowledge that could reunite [PAWN_objective] with [PAWN_pronoun] family. Finally [PAWN_pronoun] found it, an ancient tome, written by a Sload. But time had taken its tole on [PAWN_nameDef], and plans may have changed since [PAWN_pronoun] started the search.
